content: the blog post with the free graph for this design is published on the underground crafter blog finished size is approximately 43 x53 if using caron simply soft or 52 x64 if using a worsted weight yarn this listing includes 2 different versions of the c2c pattern right handed c2c from bottom right corner left handed c2c from bottom left corner each version has a 1 page and enlarged 4 page graph you will receive one pdf document with the right handed version followed by the left handed version 25 pages total pattern difficulty level intermediate must know basics of c2c crochet uses chain double_crochet slip_stitch please note the graph for this pattern has been provided for free on the underground crafter blog this pdf file contains the graphs and written out instructions to help you complete the project with little difficulty you are welcome to sell any finished items you made using my patterns please do not sell or share the pattern itself sample pattern the pattern format is as follows r- red w-white row 1 r1 row 2 r2 row 3 r2 w1 row 4 r1 w3 row 5 r1 w2 r1 w1 … etc please note that due to the nature of digital products pattern purchases will not be refunded i try to make my listings clear to show you how the pattern will be formatted and what to expect when purchasing if you have questions about the pattern feel free to ask me prior to purchasing livingthecraftlife@gmail com
